comment.body:
> I just wanted to publish it anyway :) 
thx 
>It's very unlikely that someone will do this since it's such a niche thing 
yeah, I saw yesterday a few requests regarding changing ZeroIDs

@muja 

I am seeing in my logs this:

```
[09:27:51] Site:1QLLPp..BnAx Invalid cert signer: zeroverse.bit
[09:27:51] Site:1QLLPp..BnAx data/users/18chexM4rXe3ek2BB2tQnKhmY5EqynzuFP/content.json invalid cert!
```

and I just checked: 
the dir 18chexM4rXe3ek2BB2tQnKhmY5EqynzuFP doesn't exist anymore on your site.
And the user which the directory belonged to is actually me: yilmazerkan@zeroverse.bit

Any idea what happened?
